distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for nodejs12 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-44906: Fixed a prototype pollution in node-minimist (bsc#1198247).
- CVE-2021-44907: Fixed a potential Denial of Service vulnerability in node-qs (bsc#1197283).
- CVE-2022-0235: Fixed an exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor in node-fetch (bsc#1194819).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.title: CVE description
